title: of section 6 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs and Trade (Alteration
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs and Trade (Alteration 

of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 24 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited foreign affair trade (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 24 september 2020

title: of section 6 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála and, in the English 
language, the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha and, in the English language, 
to that of the Department of Foreign Affairs.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn gnothai eachtracha agus tradala english language department foreign affair trade altered irish language roinn gnothai eachtracha english language department foreign affair

title: of section 6 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála 
and, in the English language, the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade, is 
altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Gnóthaí Eachtracha and, in the 
English language, to that of the Minister for Foreign Affairs.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire gnothai eachtracha agus tradala english language minister foreign affair trade altered irish language taire gnothai eachtracha english language minister foreign affair

title: of section 6 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

references to the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade shall 
be construed as references to the Department of Foreign Affairs, 
and 

(b) 

references to the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade shall be 
construed as references to the Minister for Foreign Affairs. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [382] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [382]
